scripts.transpile: babel src assets/scripts/js/main.js > assets/scripts/js/main2.js && mv assets/scripts/js/main2.js assets/scripts/js/main.js
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs assets/scripts/js/main.js --compress --mangle -o assets/scripts/js/main2.js && mv assets/scripts/js/main2.js assets/scripts/js/main.js
